overview: Against the backdrop of the race for mayor of Las Vegas, a mad bomber is on the loose and his target is Pacific Cargo Shipping. The company hires expert and world-renowned P.I., Bud Chelzer, to investigate the latest bombing in Las Vegas, NV. At the same time, Brad Morrison, a recently fired singer/comedian, has just been approached by a sexy and mysterious woman...
title: The S.I.N.
